    • Uses of IdpAuthenticationAdapter in com.pingidentity.sdk

      Subinterfaces of IdpAuthenticationAdapter in com.pingidentity.sdk 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IdpAuthenticationAdapterV2
      This interface defines the methods that the PingFederate IdP server calls to authenticate a user or logout a user session.

    • Uses of IdpAuthenticationAdapter in org.sourceid.saml20.adapter.idp.authn

      Classes in org.sourceid.saml20.adapter.idp.authn that implement IdpAuthenticationAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPasswordIdpAuthnAdapter
      Deprecated. 
      Use the HttpBasicIdpAuthnAdapter and HttpFormIdpAuthnAdapter. These classes separate the Basic/Form functionality and use the PasswordCredentialValidator which is the new direction PF is taking for un/pw validation
